description: Have you ever had trouble keeping your focused attention on a speaker? Have you ever listened to a speaker but the words seemed meaningless, and just didn't connect? The Listening for Understanding course will provide you with the tools you need and is your guide to becoming a better listener. Whether you're just looking to sharpen your listening skills, or you want to take your listening skills to the next level, this course is for you! Through engaging videos, and activities you will learn tips, tricks and strategies that will enable you to get a firm grasp on the listening basics, overcome listening barriers, and become an all-around better listener.
title: Say What! Listening for Understanding
